name: Holy Pigs
description:
Run from the e-scooters! Drop the holy pigs!

One player drives the car with the WASD buttons.
The other player drops pigs with the mouse.

Press escape to close the game and F1 will restart the game.

Coins must be collected in order to unlock pigs.
Apples will restore health.
Colliding with anything else will cost health.

E-Scooters will be chasing you!

This game was created at the Berlin Mini Jam 2019 September.

Credits:
Alessio, Joe, Juri, Leo, Luca, Martin & Nils
